ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Received"), DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATEVALUE("2023-08-16"), Opportunity__r.Record_Type__c <> "Scale", Marketer_UW_Name__r.Account.Name = "Underwriters at Lloyd's of London (CFC)", Carrier_Issuing_Company__r.Name <> "Underwriters at Lloyd's of London (CFC)")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Marketer/UW Account = “Underwriters at Lloyd's of London (CFC)” then Carrier Issuing Company also has to be “Underwriters at Lloyd's of London (CFC)”
